Comment.Language: For the first week of the month of Koiahk:

Text.Language: Za,ariac piou/b p~s/ri m~Bara,iac ef,/ qen piervei: eftale ouc~yoinoufi e~p~swi.
Zechariah the priest, son of Berachiah, was in the temple offering incense.

When he saw the light, which was in his face; he was terrified and fell down to his feet.
